definition: to harness/to draw (a cart etc)/to drive/to pilot/to sail/to ride/your good self/prefixed word denoting respect (polite 敬辞)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]

sentences.english: 27At that time they will see the Son of Man coming in a cloud with power and great glory.
sentences.chinese: 那时，他们要看见人子有能力，有大荣耀驾云降临。

sentences.english: Wilt thou ride with me, some fine night, to see thy father?
sentences.chinese: 你愿意在一个晚上和我一起驾云上天去看你父亲吗？

sentences.english: So Yahweh is described like Baal, as riding on the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华被描述成像Baal一样的，驾云飞行。

definition: to die/to fly on a crane
to fly on a crane/to die
Temple in Heaven (e.g. of the Jade Emperor)
the Jade lake on Mount Kunlun, residence of Xi Wangmu 西王母
Lingshan county in Qinzhou 欽州|钦州[Qin1 zhou1], Guangxi
lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
to ride the wind/to use a fair wind/to take an opportunity
Xiangyun county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
Laozi or Lao-tze (c. 500 BC), Chinese philosopher, the founder of Taoism/the sacred book of Daoism, 道德經|道德经 by Laozi
